Tokens.text: Hey... uuh, hello. My name is Lecall.
I need your help. You're an alchemist, right?

Tokens.innerText: link-goto:"Yeah.","Yeah."
Tokens.name: linkgoto

Tokens.text: Great! I... so you make potions and stuff then? And help people?

Tokens.innerText: link-goto:"Sometimes...","Sometimes..."
Tokens.name: linkgoto

Tokens.text: Can you... can you make a love potion?

Tokens.name: linkgoto
Tokens.text: (link-goto:"Who are we talking about?","Who are we talking about?")

Tokens.name: linkgoto

Tokens.text: Well. If you hear of anyone, I live in the cobbler's shop down the street. I... could really use the help.

Tokens.text: No, Sorry. You're right. I don't know anything about alchemy, I just go by what everyone knows, right? Like, it's no secret you all are able to control wraithfire. Why not love?

Tokens.innerText: link-goto:"...Sure. Well. Some of us might be able to do that. I'm not one of them, so don't clump us all together, a'ight?","lump"

Tokens.text: But... aren't love potions supposed to harbour love? Create the spark that otherwheres never existed? Conjoin the two flowers in the wind and make them dance?
